pkgmetadata.longdescription: Long Non-Coding RNA Identification Based on Features of Sequence, EIIP and Secondary Structure // Functions for predicting sequences are mRNAs or long non-coding RNAs. Default models are trained on human, mouse and wheat datasets by employing SVM. Features are based on intrinsic composition of sequence, EIIP value (electron-ion interaction pseudopotential) and secondary structure. The model can also be built on users' own data.
